content.title: Victim Advocacy
content.description: This page is for those who think they may have experienced sexual misconduct or abuse by a pastor, staff member, or lay leader within The Meeting House. Check it out to see ways to contact a victim advocacy, access counselling, or connect with a pastor.

image1.alt: View of a blue sky through yellow leaves.

content.header1: Victim Advocacy at The Meeting House
content.text1: We grieve with all victims and are committed to taking all allegations of sexual misconduct seriously. We encourage anyone who thinks they may have experienced sexual misconduct or abuse by a pastor, staff member, or lay leader within The Meeting House to contact Melodie Bissell confidentially via the methods available below.
Click below to read the latest updates from The Meeting House regarding the on-going investigations.

image1.alt: Graphic of The Meeting House logo.

content.text1: If you need to process further, you can connect with a lead pastor. If you need financial assistance with counselling, please speak to your local pastor.

image1.alt: Graphic of The Meeting House logo.
